final_answer:
The humor in this image comes from the visual and textual juxtaposition. On the left, there’s a muscular person who has a typical tough and confident appearance, supported by tattoos, depicted under the word "YES." This suggests a straightforward positive or impressive quality.

On the right, labeled with the word "BUT," is an extreme close-up of hairy skin, which contrasts starkly with the cool and collected persona displayed. This unexpected detail humorously undermines the initial impression, creating a satirical twist that plays on the difference between expectations and reality.
ground_truth: The image is funny because while from the distance it seems that the man has big tattoos on both of his arms upon a closer look at the arms it turns out there is no tattoo and what seemed to be tattoos are just hairs on his arm.
